title: Backgrounding Budgets and Profits for Cattle Nov 2020

tasks.task: Analyze farm budgeting for backgrounding steers and heifers.
subtasks: Identify various feed rations and their respective costs.
Calculate average daily gain rates for steers and heifers.
Project revenue from market prices for different weight categories.
Estimate costs including feed, yardage, and overhead expenses.
Assess profitability based on varying average daily gain scenarios.
Compare finishing weights and corresponding market prices.
Evaluate the impact of higher feed costs versus higher market prices.
